basics.label: Chef
basics.summary: Accomplished personal chef, committed to culinary excellence, quality ingredients and personalized service seeking to add his extensive culinary skill and knowledge of nutrition and health to best serve the needs of every person he cooks for.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Chef, Chef Consultant, Banquet Chef, Executive Sous Chef, Shepherd/Caretaker
work.summary: Maintained daily culinary operations of multiple local properties, cooking for private client and multiple guests in multiple homes. Cooked for celebrities, executives, investors, & heads of state among others. Provided nutrition, diet & recipe planning for various patients, Taught diet, nutrition & cooking classes and smart consumer classes.
highlights: Trained area chefs on utilization of seasonal and regional produce in cuisine
Served on opening team for $800 million hotel
Managed relationships with vendors, negotiated prices of ingredients and equipment
Transformed kitchen culture from one of pre-packaged food to scratch cooking

education.institution: Culinary Institute of America, West Virginia Wesleyan
courses: Food anthropology and Charcuterie Study in Spain

skills.name: Culinary Skills
keywords: Classically trained chef proficient in all facets of food production
Able to shop and manage acquisition of specialty foods and foods which are maximally nutrient dense
Proven ability to manage daily culinary operations for multiple households with changing needs and demands
Expertise with various forms of protocol and table service
